activities:
The types of personal information collected are:
Name 
Email address 
Routing
Ticket Cost 
Invoice Number
Class of Service
We use the information to report data back to the client for their total travel program.

recoursemech:
Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be directed to the Travizon Privacy Office at the address given below. Travizon will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the principles contained in this Policy.
